About the Company: Allsec Technologies Ltd is engaged in the business of providing IT enabled services. The services provided by the company include data verification processing of orders received through telephone calls, telemarketing, monitoring quality of calls of other call centers, customer services and HR and payroll processing for domestic companies. The company has also invested in a wholly-owned subsidiary in USA for the purpose of carrying out marketing activities for the company.The company is a BPO with multiple delivery centers in India and Philippines, supporting a global clientele. They offer voice and non- voice services with world class back office acumen.The company is a premier provider of client services support, technical support, quality assurance, sales, collections, customer satisfaction, payroll solutions, web development services and e-mail & chat support.

management.name: Ajit Abraham Isaac
